Title: Enacts the essential workers student grant act to provide student financial aid grants to individuals who served as essential workers during the state of emergency declared as a result of COVID-19
Summary: Enacts the essential workers student grant act to provide student financial aid grants to individuals who served as essential workers during the state of emergency declared as a result of COVID-19.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "essential workers student grant act" to provide student financial aid grants to individuals who served as essential workers during the state of emergency declared as a result of COVID-19
